sentences: Co-Chairs Kjellén (Sweden) and Salamat (Iran) introduced a revised draft decision on FCCC Articles 4.8 and 4.9 (adverse effects).
The group considered half of the draft text.

Divergence of views focused on: whether to 'establish' or 'continue' a process for the further implementation of FCCC Articles 4.8 and 4.9; what the process was about; whether it should be assessed by the Parties 'annually,' 'periodically,' 'on a 'regular basis' or 'by COP-6 and subsequent COPs as appropriate'; whether there should be one or two workshops in 2000; and what topics the workshop/s should address.
A proposal requesting Annex I Parties to report on initial actions undertaken to implement FCCC Articles 4.8 and 4.9 was discussed.
Some delegates considered that non-Annex I Parties should also be requested to report on these actions.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
